I would definitely suggest her to everyone.

review:
**Review for Dr. Nidhi Nagda, Dentist**

I had an excellent experience with Dr. Nidhi Nagda at her dental clinic. 

She did a fantastic job correcting and aligning my teeth, resulting in a beautiful smile that I am absolutely proud of. 

Dr. Nagda's approach was both professional and compassionate, making the entire process comfortable and stress-free. 

Her attention to detail and expertise in dentistry are evident in the results. 

The staff at the clinic were also very welcoming and efficient, contributing to a highly positive overall experience. 

I would highly recommend Dr. Nagda to anyone looking for top-notch dental care.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind  and encouraging words. We are grateful for patients like you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
A pretty late review but it is never too late to share a review!!!
( This isn't a sponsored post)

Growing up in a household that gave a lot of importance to oral health, I was very particular the same focus is given to Vidhisha‚Äôs dental health too. While Vidhisha‚Äôs first set of teeth appeared, I noticed two teeth that were a little different ‚Äì one had a slight stain while one started bleeding. Inspite of persistent reminders to brush twice a day and maximum efforts to keep her away from chocolates, cavity formation had already began (the struggle to get both these done deserves another post ‚Äì Phew!!). 
My hunt for a Pedodontist started and exactly at that time while scrolling through a few posts and pages on Facebook, I came across a reel by @thesmilehousedentistry
wherein the dentist was treating a dental issue on a 5/6 year old.

What did I do before visiting the dentist?
Vidhisha‚Äôs interest towards reading proved to be a biggest advantage for me ‚Äì I read the Peppa pig book titled ‚Äì A visit to the dentist several times and explained to her why keeping teeth clean was important. The parent has to be a role model too - Vidhisha sees me brush my teeth twice (Again getting other family members brush twice and also answer Vidhisha‚Äôs question as to why they do not brush twice is a big pain!!). Screen time also included a few videos on the importance of brushing and dental hygiene.
I called them to understand how the process of visiting them and fixing an appointment worked. Our first visit was in the evening when we were introduced to the staff and Doctors - Nidhi and Shalaka who were extremely warm and welcoming. After examining, we were told the treatment to take up and how it would be carried out. In the entire time we spent there, a lot of effort was taken to make Vidhisha very comfortable and get used to the space. The best thing was the TV that was set up at the ceiling so that the patient could be little distracted while the process was on. We had carried our books too to share the story with the doctors.
I fixed the second follow-up visit on a non-working Saturday considering Vidhisha and I had a holiday. Vidhisha underwent a fluoride treatment which would delay the effect of the cavity that was slowly forming. While the entire process was on, Dr.S as we called Dr. Shalaka kept talking to her as if she was painting her teeth with colours. The conversations they had were exactly at the eye level and each question was patiently answered. Dr.S made sure the Peppa pig series was being screened keeping in mind the earlier interaction we had. The support staff there was equally considerate to our needs and requirements. And what was the goodbye gift we got ‚Äì Peppa pig stickers!! J
Last but not the least, appreciate the team for considering the request put forth by me to mask Vidhisha‚Äôs face while taking any pictures and videos and later sharing on social media.
It has been almost 6 months now ‚Äì so far so good. We will soon visit them to understand if the treatment done is all fine or any more changes have to be made!

Thank you team once again!
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words, we were so glad Vidisha enjoyed her dental treatment and continue to enjoy her dental journey. üòÉ

review:
** ****** ** * **** **** ******** She explains the treatment process and options very well.
I feel the most important thing in dental treatment is the pain that you feel while the treatment is going on. Dr Nidhi's hand on treatment is extremely light and I nearly felt any pain while the treatment.
I did the following treatments.
Cavity cleaning and new ceramic caps. The new caps are placed  very well and perfect size.
Total dental cleaning.
Few fillings.

Overall I am happy with the treatment and satisfied.

Thanks Dr Nidhi.

context: Tooth Decay,Bleeding Gums,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Cavities,Rotten Teeth,
review: I have bad gums which has resulted in me facing dental issues almost all my life. However, this is the first time in 30 years that I actually went for all my follow up appointments and finished my entire treatment, all thanks to Dr. Nidhis skills. I went for 9 sittings over a span of 2 months and she was nothing but friendly through it all. The big bonus are her skilled hands which ensured minimum pain for me. I had a very satisfying experience and I would definitely recommend her if you have dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have been visiting rhe clinic regularly, and even though  the prices for the treatment are on high side, prefer this one for doctor  friendliness, their competence and hygeine. But I am highly dissatisfied by my RCT  done by Dr Nidhi, she was quite rude, her instruments have hurt me so many a times and she wasn't even apologetic for the same.  When asked questions, I have never got a proper answer from her, attitude was a bit too much. I am still not satisfied with the cap fitting, but I rather prefer to live with the pain than to go to her again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was my first time at dentist and was apprehensive about it but luckily i was assigned to Dr Nidhi, she calmed me and made me understood why the problem had occured so that i be careful next time. Also the way she carried out the treatment was amazing. The ease and calmness with which she carried out my root canal gave me an impression that i was in rightful hands, it also showed that she had an great experience in her feild and through knowledge about the procedure. Getting treated by Dr Nidhi, i am now no longer afraid of dentist and tooth aches. Dr Vohra's dental clinic is the epitome of professionalism and one stop solution for all dental problem. Dr Nidhi keep up the good work and thanks for attending my tooth ache and helping me out during the tough times of COVID. Wish you all the very best Dr Nidhi for your future.

review:
Dr Nidhi is very calm and composed when it comes to the treatment. My case was little complicated so I gave up and asked her to remove the tooth as I wasn't able to bear the pain but she developed a confidence in me and did RCT successfully. Basically she didn't give up inspite of me being impatient. Half of your pain will go whilst discussing your dental problem and how she's going to treat it. 

My good wishes to her to grow in her career. Thanks Dr Nidhi. :)
